description.narrative: This partnership intervention will be implemented by a current partner, icipe. In this new proposed intervention, icipe will go from working with 12,500 youth in the current Youth Employment in Silk and Honey (YESH) project to enabling 100,000 youth to secure dignified and fulfilling work under the new YAW- Ethiopia strategy. The intervention will expand into four regional states of the country and create spin-off employment opportunities for local and surrounding communities to provide inputs to and use the outputs from the beekeeping and silkworm value chains. This project will leverage the learnings, successes, and relationships built under YESH to achieve MOYESH’s objectives.

participating-org.narrative: International Centre of Insect Physiology and Ecology
